name: Shutdown (nyxinabox)
description:
Explore the maze-like lab and help ROB-0-94S escape before its battery runs out. Increase its operability to move faster and don't forget to rewind it every few seconds to keep it moving.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to Move
  • E to interact with objects.
  • Spacebar to stop rewind needle.

Made by:

Verónica Moreira [Programming, Art and Gameplay Design]

José Moreira [Level Design]

Daniel Moreira [Music]

Game made in a week  for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 with the theme "Rewind".

If you find any bugs, please email us at nyxinabox.games@gmail.com.

Comments are welcome!

Follow the nyxinabox on Tumblr.
